scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development TAILWIND_COMPILE_MODE=jit TAILWIND_MODE=watch npx postcss tailwind-source.css -o ../css/styles.css --watch --verbose
scripts.build-dev: NODE_ENV=development TAILWIND_COMPILE_MODE=aot npm run build && cp tailwind-output.css ../css/styles.css npx postcss tailwind-source.css -o tailwind-output.css
scripts.build-prod: NODE_ENV=production TAILWIND_COMPILE_MODE=jit npm run build && npm run minify
